CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.5.1, narrativeincludeclinical (20000 AN)
E2B (R3): H.1 Case Narrative Including Clinical Course, Therapeutic Measures, Outcome and Additional Relevant Information User Guidance: This data element captures a focused, factual and clear description of the case, including the words or short phrases used by the reporter. Conformance: Required Data Type: 100000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures a focused, factual and clear description of the case, including the words or short phrases used by the reporter.
CustomField.label: Narrative
